intro: Selaginella corrugis, commonly known as the zigzag spike moss, is a species of spore-bearing plant belonging to the family Selaginellaceae. It is a small, evergreen plant that typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and rock crevices. The plant has a distinctive zigzag appearance due to its spirally arranged stems and leaves. It possesses a unique ability to survive extreme drought conditions by entering a state of dormancy. Selaginella corrugis plays an important ecological role in soil stabilization and provides habitat for various microorganisms.
